title: User Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials and receive a JWT token with the correct role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and JWT token is returned
Validate that the JWT token contains the correct user role (USER or ADMIN)
Verify redirection to the dashboard page

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure that login is rejected when credentials are invalid and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click the login button
Verify login fails with an error message about invalid credentials
Verify no JWT token is issued

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that access to protected API endpoints and UI features is restricted correctly based on USER or ADMIN roles.

steps.description: Log in as USER role
Attempt to access ADMIN-only API endpoint and admin UI features
Verify access is denied with appropriate status code and message
Log in as ADMIN role
Access both USER and ADMIN functionalities
Verify full access to features and APIs permitted for ADMIN

title: Client Creation with Valid Data and Document Upload
description: Verify that a new client can be created with all required fields and PDF documents can be uploaded successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the new client creation page
Fill in all mandatory client fields with valid data
Upload valid PDF document(s)
Submit the client creation form
Verify client is created and stored correctly with documents linked
Check document is accessible and the file format is PDF

title: Client Creation Field Validation and Error Handling
description: Test validation rules for client creation form with missing, invalid, or malformed data including document uploads.

steps.description: Navigate to the new client creation page
Submit form with blank required fields
Verify validation errors are shown for missing required fields
Input invalid data formats (e.g. invalid email, phone number)
Verify format validation errors are displayed
Attempt to upload non-PDF file types as document
Verify file upload is rejected and error message shown

title: Search Clients with Various Criteria
description: Verify the client listing supports search by name, ID, and other demographic filters with correct results.

steps.description: Navigate to the client listing page
Enter search query by client name
Verify filtered client list matches the query
Search by client ID
Verify correct client record is retrieved
Search using partial and case insensitive terms
Verify relevant clients are displayed
Search with no matching results
Verify appropriate 'no results' message is shown

title: Create and Monitor Salary Cession with Payment Tracking
description: Verify the workflow to create a salary cession, monitor its status, and record payments successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to new cession creation page
Create cession with valid salary and payment parameters
Submit the cession creation form
Verify cession status is set as active or pending as per logic
View cession details page
Record one or multiple payments related to the cession
Verify payment amounts update the cession balance and status correctly

title: Cession Document Generation and Download
description: Ensure that documents such as contracts and payment slips are properly generated and downloadable in PDF format for cessions.

steps.description: Access cession details for an existing cession
Trigger document generation for the cession
Verify the generated document is a valid PDF file
Download the PDF document
Verify that the downloaded document opens and contains accurate cession details

title: Record Expense and Income with Validation and Reporting
description: Test adding new expense and income entries including validation and verify that reports and charts reflect the new data accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the expense tracking page
Add a new expense with valid category, amount, and date
Verify the expense entry is saved and visible in the expense list
Navigate to the income recording page
Add a new income entry with valid data
Verify the income entry is saved and displayed correctly
Open financial reports and charts page
Verify reports and interactive charts accurately reflect newly added expenses and income

title: Inventory Product and Category CRUD Operations
description: Verify that products and categories can be created, read, updated, and deleted correctly with stock tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to product category management page
Create a new product category with valid input
Verify the category is listed
Edit the category and save changes
Verify updated category information is displayed
Create a new product with assigned category and stock quantity
Verify product appears with correct details including stock
Update product information including stock changes
Verify stock tracking updates reflect correctly
Delete product and category
Verify removal from listing and no data inconsistencies remain

title: Multi-language Switching and RTL Layout Validation
description: Test language switching among Arabic, English, and French including RTL layout rendering for Arabic.

steps.description: Navigate to the application settings page
Change language to Arabic
Verify all UI text is in Arabic and the layout is rendered RTL properly
Switch language to French
Verify UI text displays in French with default LTR layout
Switch language to English
Confirm UI text is in English and layout is LTR

title: JWT Token Expiry and Refresh Token Mechanism
description: Verify session management by testing expiration of JWT tokens and successful token refresh for an active user session.

steps.description: Log in and obtain valid JWT and refresh tokens
Simulate JWT token expiry
Attempt authorized API call with expired JWT token
Verify request is rejected due to token expiry
Use refresh token to obtain new JWT token
Verify new JWT token is issued and user can resume activity without re-login

title: Secure File Upload with Virus Scan and File Type Validation
description: Verify that file uploads accept only PDF files and trigger virus scanning to ensure safe document storage.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a valid PDF document
Verify upload completes successfully and file is scanned
Attempt to upload executable or other dangerous file types
Verify upload is rejected due to invalid file type
Simulate virus detection by uploading infected file
Verify upload is blocked and user is notified

title: Responsive UI Rendering Across Devices and Browsers
description: Test the application's UI on multiple device types (desktop, tablet, mobile) and browsers to ensure consistent and responsive rendering.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browsers (Windows, macOS, Linux)
Verify UI layouts are responsive and functional
Open application on mobile devices (iOS, Android) and different screen resolutions
Verify UI adapts to screen size, touch interactions work, and no layout breaks occur
Test application in PWA mode offline
Verify offline capabilities and correct caching are functional

title: Performance Test for Large Dataset Handling and Search Efficiency
description: Validate application responsiveness and speed when processing large numbers of clients and cessions, including search operations.

steps.description: Populate the database with a large volume of client and cession records (thousands)
Navigate to client listing page and measure page load time
Verify page loads within acceptable performance limits without UI freezing
Perform client search queries with various parameters
Verify search returns results quickly and UI remains responsive
Open dashboard charts with large financial datasets
Verify charts render quickly and interactivity is smooth using Chart.js

title: API Security: Input Sanitization and SQL Injection Prevention
description: Test that the backend properly sanitizes input fields and prevents SQL injection attacks across API endpoints.

steps.description: Send API requests with malicious SQL injection patterns in input fields (e.g., ' OR 1=1 --)
Verify server rejects malicious inputs and no unauthorized data access occurs
Send API requests with script injection payloads for XSS testing
Verify input is sanitized and no script execution is possible

title: Cross-Platform Installation and Functional Verification
description: Verify that the application installs and runs correctly on supported desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux), web browsers (PWA), and mobile platforms (iOS, Android).

steps.description: Install desktop application on Windows, macOS, and Linux
Verify the application launches and core functionality (login, navigation, workflows) work as expected
Access the application via supported web browsers and install PWA
Verify PWA features operate correctly including offline mode
Install and run the mobile application on iOS and Android devices
Verify application functions including offline availability and performance

title: Audit Logging and GDPR Compliance Validation
description: Ensure that all critical user actions are logged accurately and data privacy measures meet GDPR and security policies.

steps.description: Perform sensitive operations such as client creation, document upload, payment recording
Verify audit logs capture user action, timestamp, and affected data
Test deletion of user personal data respecting GDPR (right to be forgotten)
Verify data is erased or anonymized properly from audit logs and storage

title: Session Logout and Token Revocation
description: Verify that user logout properly invalidates JWT tokens and ends sessions to prevent unauthorized access.

steps.description: Log in as a user and obtain JWT token
Perform logout action
Verify JWT token is revoked or blacklisted server-side
Attempt to access protected resources with old JWT token
Verify access is denied requiring fresh authentication

title: Offline Mode Functionality in PWA and Mobile
description: Test that the application supports offline operations where applicable and syncs data correctly once the network is restored.

steps.description: Access the application in PWA or mobile app online
Navigate to client or payment pages
Disconnect network to simulate offline
Verify previously loaded data remains accessible and UI indicates offline mode
Create or edit client or record payments offline
Verify changes are stored locally without errors
Reconnect network
Verify offline changes synchronize with backend successfully
